TextLang.Text: A file with the same name already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
An error has occurred.
The data is corrupted.
There is not enough free space on the Memory Stick™.
The Memory Stick™ is locked.
The Memory Stick™ cannot be accessed.
The Memory Stick™ cannot be read.
There is no Memory Stick™ inserted.
There is not enough free space on the SD Memory Card.
The SD Memory Card is locked.
The SD Memory Card cannot be accessed.
The SD Memory Card cannot be read.
There is no SD Memory Card inserted.
There is not enough free space on the CompactFlash®.
The CompactFlash® is locked.
The CompactFlash® cannot be accessed.
The CompactFlash® cannot be read.
There is no CompactFlash® inserted.
There is not enough free space on the USB device.
The USB device is locked.
The USB device cannot be accessed.
The USB device cannot be read.
There is no USB device inserted.
There is not enough free space on the hard disk.
The hard disk cannot be accessed.
Connect storage media.
Exporting... Please wait.
Export completed.
Do you want to cancel the export operation?
The export operation could not be completed.
Do you want to export the data?
This data exceeds the maximum size that can be exported.
Importing... Please wait.
Import completed.
Do you want to cancel the import operation?
The import operation could not be completed.
Do you want to import the data?
This data exceeds the maximum size that can be imported.
There is no data.
The export operation could not be completed. There is no data on the storage media.
The import operation could not be completed. There is no data on the storage media.
